why_are_you_rejecting_this_application_d:
The candidate was unable to demonstrate an understanding of the role. He possess good skills with music and understands the requirements of the GCSE, however this is limited and responses were recounting how he was taught.  

Limited knowledge of world music, and limited perspective on supporting learners in younger year groups who lack and music interest or knowledge or experience of playing an instrument or reading music. 

Answers relating to reasons to coming into teaching demonstrate idealised ideas, and demonstrate a naïve perspective on the demands of the role. 

Students question at the end seemed to suggest he didn’t understand the structure of the course, and that he would primarily be on placement.
